title: An Act relative to mitigation during department of transportation projects

abstracts.abstract: By Representative McMurtry of Dedham, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4131) of Paul McMurtry relative to mitigation during department of transportation projects.  Transportation.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Transportation
